document_data.name: Pella Dheolur
document_data.mainbody: '''Pella Dheolur''' was a member of the [[Dheolur]] noble house of [[Cormyr]]. She was the sister of [[Lord Dheolur]].
document_data.Description: She was of slight build. Her palms contained fanged mouths with oozing green lips.
document_data.History: She was killed in [[432 DR]] by a blue ball of fire cast by [[Amedahast]] during the attack on house [[Dheolur]] by King [[Duar Obarskyr]].
